2. Data: it may be easier to show your datasets in a table
5,6. Storage, Preservation: you can also setup automatic backup to onedrive via onedrive settings, backup, manage backup. For preservation using a hard disk only is risky the archive server may be more suitable. For more information see https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/services/onedrive and https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT team. 
7. Sharing: you can also consider KU Leuven RDR for data sharing: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr, if needed you can apply an embargo or access restrictions.
